about-description: Help setting up Terra Mystica game by choosing factions and tiles randomly.
action-phase-scoring.any-track-upgrade: 2 victory points when advancing on the Shipping or Exchange tracks.
action-phase-scoring.dwelling: 2 victory points when building a dwelling.
action-phase-scoring.level-3-building: 5 victory points when building the stronghold, sanctuary or shipyard.
action-phase-scoring.temple: 4 victory points when building a temple.
action-phase-scoring.town: 2 victory points when founding a town.
action-phase-scoring.trade: 2 victory points when resolving a trade.
action-phase-scoring.trading-house: 3 victory points when building a trading house.
allow-town-scoring-1st-round-description: If unchecked, the scoring tile that gives 5 points when funding a town will not appear in the first round.
allow-town-scoring-1st-round: Allow action phase scoring for towns in first round.
bonus-card.cult-track-and-coins: Advance 1 in a cult track and 2 coins
bonus-card.points-3rd-building-and-worke: 4 points for each 3<sup>rd</sup> level building and 2 workers
bonus-card.points-dwelling-and-coins: 1 point for each Dwelling and 2 coins
bonus-card.points-shipping-and-power: 3 points for shipping upgrades and 3 power
bonus-card.points-ships-coind-and-worker: 3 points for each ship, 1 coin and 1 worker
bonus-card.points-trade-and-ship: 1 point for each trade and 1 ship
bonus-card.points-trading-house-and-work: 2 points for each Trading House and 1 worker
bonus-cards-description: {{num}} bonus cards to pick randomly from.
bonus-cards-invalid: As many bonus cards as players + 3 are necessary. Select more bonus cards.
extra-final-scoring-tiles-description: {{num}} extra final scoring tiles to pick randomly from.
factions-invalid: There are more players than distinct terrains for the selected factions. Select more factions.
final-scoring-tile.outpost: Number of structures in the border
game-boards-description: {{num}} game boards to pick randomly from.
game-boards-invalid: At least one game board is required.
player-names-required: Enter a name for all players
predefined-profile.all-official: Fire & Ice + Mini expansion + Merchants of the Seas (Official)
predefined-profile.fire-ice-and-mini-exp: Fire & Ice  + Mini expansion + Power is coming
predefined-profile.power-coming: Power is coming, with basic game set
reward-condition.cult-air: for each {{count}} spaces in the cult of air
reward-condition.cult-earth: for each {{count}} spaces in the cult of earth
reward-condition.cult-fire: for each {{count}} spaces in the cult of fire
reward-condition.cult-water: for each {{count}} spaces in the cult of water
reward-condition.priest: for each priest placed in any cult
scoring-tiles-description: {{num}} scoring tiles to pick randomly from.
scoring-tiles-invalid: At least 6 scoring tiles are required which could be combined in a way such that the same cult is not scored three times.
